description.value:
Cup of Sovereignty (Fetish)

Creation Cost: 12 Gnosis

A ceremonial cup bound to spirits of authority and judgment.

Effect: As an action, choose one creature within 30 feet. The creature must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw (DC 8 + your proficiency bonus + your Wisdom modifier) or:

  • Be unable to take hostile actions against you for 1 minute
  • Be compelled to speak truthfully for the duration (no forced secrets)

This is not charm or domination. Usable once per long rest.
